thread.title: Minnesota DFL hires Rachel Boyer as communications director
thread.title_full: Minnesota DFL hires Rachel Boyer as communications director

author: Joe Kimball
title: Minnesota DFL hires Rachel Boyer as communications director
text:
By Joe Kimball | 03:33 pm 
The Minnesota DFL has hired Rachel Boyer to be its new communications director. 
She replaces Ellen Perrault, who left in July. 
Boyer is a native of Fairbanks, Alaska, and a graduate of Concordia College in Moorhead. 
She's been working at NARAL Pro-Choice America. Her previous stints include press secretary for the Texas Democratic Party, work on Rep. Keith Ellisonâ€™s election campaign and in his office in Washington, D.C., and in Sen. Al Franken's office. 
She starts Oct. 12. Get MinnPost's top stories in your inbox First Name: *
